content: icy conditions beanie is a cozy winter staple with big not today energy my gift to you knit wear and share knit in the round with us 5 and us 6 needles this beanie features bold charted colorwork chart only and works beautifully in light worsted or heavy dk for a warm but not bulky winter make add a pom on top for maximum winter attitude stay safe out there when things get ice y love and sass from mn ❄️ notes worked in the round with charted colorwork chart only adjust fit by needle size size up for larger size down for smaller
